## About me

Welcome to my personal website! I am a second-year graduate student of the Applied Statistics for Social Science program at NYU Steinhardt as well as a recent graduate from Macalester College, obtaining bachelor degrees in both Economics and Applied Mathematics & Statistics. I have used R programming language since my first year in college. I enjoy using R for machine learning, data analysis, data visualization and creating Shiny apps.
